import React from 'react' const ClockDisplay = (props) =>{ let date = new Date(props.time) let dialStyle = { position: 'relative', top: 100, left: 100, width: 400, height: 400, borderRadioous: 2000, borderStyle: 'solid', borderColer: 'black' } let secondHandStyle ={ position: 'relative', top: 200, left: 200, border: '1px solid red', width: '40%', height: 1, transform: 'rotate(' + ((date.getSeconds()/60) * 360 - 90).toString()+ 'deg)', transformOrigin: '0% 0%', backroundColor: 'red' } let minHandStyle ={ position: 'relative', top: 200, left: 200, border: '1px solid red', width: '40%', height: 3, transform: 'rotate(' + ((date.getSeconds()/60) * 360 - 90).toString()+ 'deg)', transformOrigin: '0% 0%', backroundColor: 'red' } let hourHandStyle={ position: 'relative', top: 194, left: 206, border: '1px solid red', width: '20%', height: 7, transform: 'rotate(' + ((date.getSeconds()/12) * 360 - 90).toString()+ 'deg)', transformOrigin: '0% 0%', backroundColor: 'gray' } return(
); } export default ClockDisplay;
